title: Spurs preseason finale chat with Jeff McDonald

Spurs guard Manu Ginobili passes the ball past Houston Rockets guard Corey Brewer during the first quarter at the Toyota Center on April 10, 2015, in Houston. Photo: James Nielsen /Houston Chronicle Image 2 of 18 Manu Ginobili of the Spurs (right) looks for a way around Houston's Corey Brewer during the first half of their game at the AT&T Center on Sunday, Dec. 28, 2014. Ginobili scored 15 points to help the Spurs beat the Rockets 110-106. MARVIN PFEIFFER/ mpfeiffer@express-news.net Manu Ginobili of the Spurs (right) looks for a way around Houston's Corey Brewer during the first half of their game at the AT&T Center on Sunday, Dec. 28, 2014. The NBA reviewed the play and deemed that Duncan did not foul Harden on the play. Rockets guard James Harden has his shot blocked by Spurs forward Tim Duncan after driving past forward Kawhi Leonard at the buzzer in the Spurs’ 104-103 victory at Houston on Friday. (AP Photo/Bob Levey) Houston Rockets guard James Harden (13) has his shot blocked by San Antonio Spurs forward Tim Duncan (21) as he drives past forward Kawhi Leonard (2) at the buzzer during the second half of an NBA basketball ... more Image 18 of 18 Spurs preseason finale chat with Jeff McDonald 1 / 18 Back to Gallery Join Express-News Spurs beat writer Tom Orsborn Tuesday at noon as the five-time NBA champions prepare for their preseason finale against the Houston Rockets.
Starting at 6 a.m. Friday, you can leave questions for Jeff by commenting in the chat below, or by tweeting directly at him, @JMcDonald_SAEN .
The Q&A will stay posted even after the chat concludes, so you can read back through all of Jeff's interactions and answers leading up to the tip.
RELATED : Aldridge hopes to make AT&T Center home
Throughout the season, one of the Express-News' Spurs beat reporters – Jeff McDonald, Mike Monroe, Tom Orsborn and Jabari Young — will be on hand to answer any and all Spurs-related questions you may have.
Along with the chats, follow our reporters on Twitter, read them daily in the Express-News and at MySA.com and Express-News.com and subscribe to the new weekly Spurs Nation magazine.
jmcdonald@expressnews.net
Twitter: @JMcDonald_SAEN
